displaytitle: Rearing Centaur Carrying a Female Satyr
medium: Pen, dark brown ink and gray wash over traces of black chalk
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
markings: Watermark: M A under illegible design
inscribed: lower right: Dom. Tiepolo f, the artist's signature; left center verso: 363

titles.title: Rearing Centaur Carrying a Female Satyr

bibliography.boilertext: George Knox, "Drawings by Giambattista and Domenico Tiepolo at Princeton", Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 23, no. 1 (1964): p. 2-28.
bibliography.citation: George Knox, "Drawings by Giambattista and Domenico Tiepolo at Princeton", Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 23, no. 1 (1964): p. 2-28., p. 27, no. 74; p. 20 (illus.)

bibliography.boilertext: Felton Gibbons, Catalogue of Italian Drawings in The Art Museum, Princeton University, (Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press, 1977).
